ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:130}); // {Barret}
“Which way'd that damn foo'
Sephiroth go?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:131}); // {Tifa}
“Sephiroth…
I wonder which way he went?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:132}); // {Red XIII}
“Sephiroth…
which way did he go?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:133}); // {Cid}
“…Which way did that
creep Sephiroth go!?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:134}); // {Yuffie}
“Ummm…
Which way did that
Sephiroth guy go?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:136}); // {Vincent}
“Which way did Sephiroth head?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:135}); // {Cait Sith}
“I wonder which way
Sephiroth went?”
fadeScreen({r:12, g:8, b:1, speed:64, type:32}); // unused=0

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:144}); // {Cloud}
“Sephiroth said to me…
{CYAN}Head North{WHITE}……
……{CYAN}past the Snow Fields{WHITE}……”
fadeScreen({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:0, type:0}); // unused=0
{ let pos = getEntityPosition({entityId:5}); Bank[6][0] = pos.x; Bank[6][2] = pos.y; Bank[6][4] = pos.z; Bank[6][6] = pos.triangleId; }

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:123}); // {Barret}
“That way goes to
the Mountains up north.
Let's hurry and find {Aeris}.”
{ let pos = getEntityPosition({entityId:5}); Bank[6][0] = pos.x; Bank[6][2] = pos.y; Bank[6][4] = pos.z; Bank[6][6] = pos.triangleId; }

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:124}); // {Tifa}
“If we continue this way, we'll end
up in the Northern Mountains.
{Aeris} isn't over there, right?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:138}); // {Tifa}
“{Cloud}!
Get a hold of yourself!!”
{ let pos = getEntityPosition({entityId:5}); Bank[6][0] = pos.x; Bank[6][2] = pos.y; Bank[6][4] = pos.z; Bank[6][6] = pos.triangleId; }

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:125}); // {Red XIII}
“That road leads to the Northern Mountains.
We have to go the other way
to find {Aeris}.”
{ let pos = getEntityPosition({entityId:5}); Bank[6][0] = pos.x; Bank[6][2] = pos.y; Bank[6][4] = pos.z; Bank[6][6] = pos.triangleId; }

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:126}); // {Cid}
“You thinkin' of going skiing?
If we wanna find {Aeris},
we go THAT way!”
{ let pos = getEntityPosition({entityId:5}); Bank[6][0] = pos.x; Bank[6][2] = pos.y; Bank[6][4] = pos.z; Bank[6][6] = pos.triangleId; }

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:86}); // {Yuffie}
“Ahhh--- I can't go another step!!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:127}); // {Yuffie}
“We're looking for {Aeris}, right!
Then why are you heading for
the mountains!? What a dork!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:141}); // {Yuffie}
“Wait!
Get a hold of yourself!”
{ let pos = getEntityPosition({entityId:5}); Bank[6][0] = pos.x; Bank[6][2] = pos.y; Bank[6][4] = pos.z; Bank[6][6] = pos.triangleId; }

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:128}); // {Cait Sith}
“{Cloud}, uh
that's the road to the Northern Mountains.”{PAUSE}“{Aeris} is waiting,
let's go find her.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:142}); // {Cait Sith}
“{Cloud}!
Are you all right?”
{ let pos = getEntityPosition({entityId:5}); Bank[6][0] = pos.x; Bank[6][2] = pos.y; Bank[6][4] = pos.z; Bank[6][6] = pos.triangleId; }

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:129}); // {Vincent}
“This is the road to the Northern
Mountains.
Don't you want to find {Aeris}?”
fadeScreen({r:12, g:0, b:0, speed:0, type:32}); // unused=0

dialogStrings:
[Save Point]
Access the Menu and select
{PURPLE}[SAVE]{WHITE} to save your game.

Cannot take on any more Materia.
Please discard some Materia.

{Cloud}
“So that's……the capital of the Ancients
'The Forgotten City'.”

{Cloud}
“This stream of consciousness…
Could this be the words
of the Ancients…?”

{Tifa}
“It speaks directly to my mind…
Is this the Consciousness
of the Ancients?”

{Cid}
“Hey Ancients,
I don't even have a clue
what you're trying to say to me.”

{Cid}
“Who is it? Who's trying to peek
into my mind?”{PAUSE}“Is it the Consciousness
of the Ancients?”

{Tifa}
“Do you think the people who
used to live here used it?”

{Yuffie}
“How COOL! I can't believe
we found such a soft bed
in a dive like this.”

{Cait Sith}
“We're in luck.
There's a bed in here.”

{Vincent}
“I wonder if the owners used this?”

{Red XIII}
“Hey, let's rest a bit.
I'm tired…”

{Cid}
“I'm beat.
Why don't we get some rest?”

{Yuffie}
“Come on--, let's rest for a while---
I don't want to walk anymore…”

{Cait Sith}
“Why don't we catch some ZZZs?…”

{Vincent}
“Maybe we should take a short nap?”

Here's a bed.
Get some rest?
{CHOICE}Yes
{CHOICE}No

{Cloud}
“…It's not an excuse.
I feel it in my soul.”

{Cid}
“Do you know what TIME it is!?”

{Cait Sith}
“What's wrong?
What time is it…?”

{Tifa}
“You're saying it's not just {Aeris},
but Sephiroth, too?”

{Cid}
“Wa, wa, wait a minute.
You serious!?”

{Vincent}
“…If that's true,
then we're in for it.”

{Yuffie}
“Wh…why?
How can you tell
that kind of stuff?”

{Cait Sith}
“But how can you tell that?”

{Barret}
“Then, we better get up
offa our lazy asses!!”

{Tifa}
“If that's true, then we've got to hurry!
We've got to get to {Aeris}!”

{Red XIII}
“Wh,…what should we do?
We must hurry to her!”

{Cid}
“@#$%, {Cloud}.
We can't be sittin' around
on our asses.”

{Cait Sith}
“If that's true, then we're in for it!
We have to find {Aeris} fast!”

{Vincent}
“If that's true, we should hurry.
Something terrible could happen
at any moment.”

{Barret}
“I hate to say it, but I'm beat.
Isn't there anywhere to rest.”

{Tifa}
“I'm…I'm so tired.
Can't we find somewhere to rest?”

{Red XIII}
“I'm exhausted.
Let me get some rest somewhere.”

{Cid}
“I gotta get some more rest.
Let me catch a snooze
somewhere around here.”

{Yuffie}
“I'm so----o tired!
If you don't get me to a bed,
I'm not taking another step!”

{Cait Sith}
“I'm exhausted. I'm sorry,
but please let me rest somewhere.”

{Cloud}
“I came to settle up
with Sephiroth.”

{Cait Sith}
“Why're you being so formal?
Is something wrong?”

{Cloud}
“I came here by my own free will…
Or so I thought.”{PAUSE}“However…”

{Cloud}
“…to tell the truth,
I'm afraid of myself.”

{Cloud}
“…There is a part of me
that I don't understand.”{PAUSE}“That part that made me give
the Black Materia to Sephiroth.”

{Cloud}
“If you hadn't stopped me,
{Aeris} might have been…”{PAUSE}“…There's something inside of me.
A person who is not really me.”

{Cloud}
“That's why
I should quit this journey.”{PAUSE}“Before I do something terrible.”

{Cloud}
"But I am going.”{PAUSE}“He destroyed my hometown five years ago,
killed {Aeris}, and is
now trying to destroy the Planet.
I'll never forgive…Sephiroth.”

{Cloud}
“…I have a favor to ask of you.”

{Cloud}
“…To save me
from doing something terrible.”

{Cid}
“Well, we'll face it
when it happens.”

{Cait Sith}
“Watch you?……
We're all in this together!”

{Cloud}
“I don't know how {Aeris}
tried to save the planet
from the Meteor.”{PAUSE}“And I guess now,
we'll never know.”

{Cloud}
“We still have a chance.
We must get that Black Materia back
before Sephiroth uses it.”

{Barret}
“That way goes to
the Mountains up north.
Let's hurry and find {Aeris}.”

{Tifa}
“If we continue this way, we'll end
up in the Northern Mountains.
{Aeris} isn't over there, right?”

{Red XIII}
“That road leads to the Northern Mountains.
We have to go the other way
to find {Aeris}.”

{Cid}
“You thinkin' of going skiing?
If we wanna find {Aeris},
we go THAT way!”

{Yuffie}
“We're looking for {Aeris}, right!
Then why are you heading for
the mountains!? What a dork!”

{Cait Sith}
“{Cloud}, uh
that's the road to the Northern Mountains.”{PAUSE}“{Aeris} is waiting,
let's go find her.”

{Vincent}
“This is the road to the Northern
Mountains.
Don't you want to find {Aeris}?”

{Barret}
“Which way'd that damn foo'
Sephiroth go?”

{Tifa}
“Sephiroth…
I wonder which way he went?”

{Red XIII}
“Sephiroth…
which way did he go?”

{Cid}
“…Which way did that
creep Sephiroth go!?”

{Yuffie}
“Ummm…
Which way did that
Sephiroth guy go?”

{Cait Sith}
“I wonder which way
Sephiroth went?”

{Cloud}
“Sephiroth said to me…
{CYAN}Head North{WHITE}……
……{CYAN}past the Snow Fields{WHITE}……”
